result.arabic_text: ۞ مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا
result.translation: 51.Sheetan kee kay Samaday isin taqbudecni, qaranwaa kee baaxô ginot masgalliyo catoh, kaadu mara mari ginot keenik masgalliyooy dibuk ken gine, kaadu sheetoonaa kee seehadak makkoote mara catoh haysite makkinniyo iyye Yalli.
